pr_title: Issue 4540:  Prevent readers from waiting indefinitely if there is a partial/no response from the Segment Store.

timeline.message:
First version of fix.

Signed-off-by: Sandeep <sandeep.shridhar@emc.com>

Expand timout logic to EventStreamReader.

Signed-off-by: Sandeep <sandeep.shridhar@emc.com>

timeline.bodyText: This seems really aggressive. I don't see any reason this should be more aggressive than or different from RevisionedStreamClientImpl.READ_TIMEOUT_MS. In both cases we know the server has data and we are waiting to receive it.
timeline.author: tkaitchuck

timeline.bodyText: I think this can be simplified to: in.setOffset(originalOffset, timeout);
timeline.author: tkaitchuck

timeline.bodyText: Given three instances of this if and throw, it probably makes sense to have a private method.
timeline.author: tkaitchuck

timeline.message:
CR Changes: Increase the Timeout to 30 seconds.
